item.title: Effects of Picture Stimulations on the BCI P300 Speller
item.description: What is a P300 Speller? A P300 speller implement typing by thinking through detecting the p300 signal.

item.title: i-Path : An Intelligent System for Preserving Older Adultsâ€™ Wisdom
item.description: A digital biography system for assisting older adults with preserving their memory and improving mental health.

item.title: Observational Learning
item.description: The research aims at exploring ways to improve older people’s positive attitude toward robots, especially emphasizing how companionship robots could help improve older adults' mental health.
